sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Modal, Header, Form, Image, Button, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'

class LoginForm extends React.Component {
    state = {
        newAccount: false,
		username: '',
		password: '',
		name: '',
		birthdate: '',
		bio: '',
		img: '',
		region: '',
    }

    openSignupForm = () => {
        this.setState({ 
            newAccount: true
        })
    }
    
    render() {
        return (
            <Container>
                <Modal.Content image />
                    <Image wrapped size='medium' src="" />
                    <Modal.Description style={{width: "100%"}} />
                    <Header>Profile Details</Header>
                    <Form>
                        <Form.Group widths='equal'>
                        <Form.Input 
                            fluid 
                            name="username" 
                            label="Username"
                            placeholder="user123"
                        />
                        <Form.Input 
                            fluid 
                            type="password"
                            name="password" 
                            label="Password"
                            placeholder="password..."
                        />
                        </Form.Group>

                        <React.Fragment>
                            <Form.Group widths='equal'>
                                <Form.Input 
                                    fluid 
                                    name="name" 
                                    label="Full Name"
                                    placeholder="Christopher Wallace"
                                />
                                <Form.Input 
                                    fluid 
                                    name="region" 
                                    label="region"
                                    placeholder="Washington, DC"
                                />
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Form.Group widths='equal'>
                                <Form.Input 
                                    fluid 
                                    name="birthdate" 
                                    label="Birthdate"
                                    placeholder="Jan 20, 1999"
                                />
                                <Form.Input 
                                    fluid 
                                    name="playing_since" 
                                    label="Playing Since"
                                    placeholder="1999"
                                />
                            </Form.Group>
                                <Form.Input 
                                    fluid 
                                    name="img" 
                                    label="Profile Image"
                                    placeholder="www.sweetpics.com/yourimage.jpg"
                                />
                                <Form.TextArea
                                    name="bio"
                                    label='Bio'
                                    placeholder='Whats your story? Who are your influences? Make it interesting, potential members will see it!'
                                />
							</React.Fragment>
                            <Button 
                                type="submit" 
                                floated="right" 
                                primary 
                                onClick={this.openSignupForm}
                                >Sign Up
                            </Button>
                        <Button.Group floated="right">
                            <Button type="submit"  primary >
                                Sign In
                            </Button>
                        </Button.Group>
                    </Form>
            </Container>
        )
    }
}

export default LoginForm
